text: @Jacob_Rees_Mogg I have 4 children under 9. I had coronavirus, pneumonia twice and pleurisy. It was hard to look after my kids but I NEVER considered taking them anywhere near my parents. Knowingly exposing people you love to a disease that could kill them says everything we need to know.

domain.name: Person
domain.description: Named people in the world like Nelson Mandela

domain.description: Politicians in the world, like Joe Biden
